hero.title: Meet your personal guides. Aqua, Mystic, and Coral evolve with you, from beginner to expert.

benefitsCards.title: Your personal guides on the journey

aquaYourBeginnerFriend.title: Aqua: Your Beginner Friend
aquaYourBeginnerFriend.description:
Guides your first steps.
Explains every term, every action.
Infinite patience, practical knowledge.

mysticTheWiseAdvisor.title: Mystic: The Wise Advisor
mysticTheWiseAdvisor.description:
Appears when you've mastered basics.
Introduces more sophisticated investments.
Real growth strategies.

coralTheYieldExpert.title: Coral: The Yield Expert
coralTheYieldExpert.description:
Unlocked for advanced users.
DeFi strategies, risk balancing.
Return maximization.

behavioralIntelligence.title: Behavioral Intelligence
behavioralIntelligence.description:
Mascots perceive your real progress.
Don't force premature complexity.
Evolution at your pace.

aquaYourFirstStep.title: Aqua: Your First Step
aquaYourFirstStep.description:

mysticSmartGrowth.title: Mystic: Smart Growth
mysticSmartGrowth.description:

coralHighYields.title: Coral: High Yields
coralHighYields.description:

aiThatKnowsYou.title: AI That Knows You
aiThatKnowsYou.description:

unification.title: Meet Your Financial Companions

Aqua, Mystic, and Coral.

simplicity.title: Personalized Guidance
